transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	path_file as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'files',
	fileName: 'mini.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ';',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> archivo
archivo derive(sku_cadena = toString(byName('sku_cadena')),
		venta_clp_dia = toString(byName('venta_clp_dia')),
		venta_unidades_dia = toString(byName('venta_unidades_dia')),
		stock = toString(byName('stock')),
		fecha = toString(byName('fecha')),
		cadena = toString(byName('cadena'))) ~> MapDrifted1
Sort1 aggregate(groupBy(sku_cadena,
		cadena),
	values = collect(@(fecha = fecha, venta_unidades_dia = venta_unidades_dia, venta_clp_dia = venta_clp_dia, stock = stock))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 split(equals(cadena,"Mariaside"),
	equals(cadena,"Rebeccaburgh"),
	equals(cadena,"North Eric"),
	equals(cadena,"Cookville"),
	equals(cadena,"Josephville"),
	equals(cadena,"Port Danielle"),
	equals(cadena,"South Christopher"),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Mariaside, Rebeccaburgh, NorthEric, Cookville, Josephville, PortDanielle, SouthChristopher)
ConditionalSplit1@Mariaside aggregate(groupBy(cadena),
	mariaside = collect(@(sku_cadena=sku_cadena,		values=values))) ~> AggregateM
MapDrifted1 sort(asc(fecha, true)) ~> Sort1
ConditionalSplit1@Rebeccaburgh aggregate(groupBy(cadena),
	Rebeccaburgh = collect(@(sku_cadena=sku_cadena,		values=values))) ~> AggregateR
AggregateM sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Mariaside.json'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		mariaside
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkM
AggregateR sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Rebeccaburgh.json'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Rebeccaburgh
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkR
